description: For an easy twist on an Aussie classic, make this mango jelly vanilla slice with caramelised pastry.
name: Mango Jelly Vanilla Slice Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Strain mango mixture through a sieve over custard. Chill for 4 hours or until set. Serve with extra mango.
